fullText: This Disney musical about the 1899 newspaper strike is a crowd-pleaser that combines old-fashioned razzle-dazzle with contemporary energy.
dtliExcerpt: This Disney musical about the 1899 newspaper strike is a crowd-pleaser that combines old-fashioned razzle-dazzle with contemporary energy.
bwwExcerpt: You can see why [Jeremy Jordan is] being hailed as Broadway's new star hunk. JorDan May want to unclench his manly jaws once in a while, but his charming Jack hits a good balance of sexiness and humor, and he has a velvety singing voice.Â Still, there's a reason the show's title is plural: The story is about strength in numbers, and the best songs all deploy the big ensemble.
